attributes.action: Opt out of TV Licence (Following Channel Removal - No longer use the service)
attributes.additional_details:
This is to create an opt-out of the licence fee if you do not agree with the way the BBC is cutting channels and services. If you have had enough and want to opt out, click here!
This should give them a wake-up cal!

rejection.details: This is an operational matter for the BBC.
